name: Icsscheckbox
body: iCSSCheckBox ============ iPhone style checkbox in CSS3 ![iCSSCheckbox](http://i.imgur.com/KVDW2vB.png) ### How to use: First add the icsscheckbox.css file to your project's files then add a link to the page you want to use the checkbox in: ```html ``` Use the following html code to place the checkbox in your page: ```html ``` Don't forget to replace "icheckbox1" for other checkboxes if you are using multiple ones in your page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
